snippet: On view will be highlights of the Paley holdings, including Picasso's famous 1905-6 painting "Boy Leading a Horse'' and Gauguin's "Seed of the Areoi" from 1892.
abstract: On view will be highlights of the Paley holdings, including Picasso's famous 1905-6 painting "Boy Leading a Horse'' and Gauguin's "Seed of the Areoi" from 1892.

headline.main: Paley Art Collection Heading to the de Young Fine Arts Museums in San Francisco
